sentences.en: A selfless man has an indomitable spirit.
As a soldier, he showed selfless devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 作为战士, 他表现出了对其天职的无私奉献.

sentences.en: Being upright , honest and selfless, he is respected by people.
sentences.cn: 他廉正无私, 受人尊敬.

sentences.en: Few people, when it comes down to it, are so selfless.
sentences.cn: 说到底，很少有人能这样无私。

sentences.en: He is selfless as a teacher.
sentences.cn: 作为一名教师,他是无私的.

sentences.en: Her selfless spirit qualifies her for the task.
sentences.cn: 她的无私精神使她适合担当这项工作.

sentences.en: His selfless spirit is revealed in every thing he does.
sentences.cn: 他无私的精神表现在各个方面.

sentences.en: His selfless spirit is worth praising.
sentences.cn: 他的无私精神值得赞扬.

sentences.en: I like the butterfly orchid, Phalaenopsis like tenacious and selfless dedication.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢蝴蝶兰, 喜欢蝴蝶兰的顽强和无私奉献的精神.

sentences.en: I realized how selfless Rinpoche is at helping people!
sentences.cn: 我终了解到仁波切是如此无私地正在帮助著人们!

sentences.en: It is the working class that is most selfless.
Perhaps the only all-enduring and selfless love was that of a mother for her child.
sentences.cn: 或许唯一持久无私的爱就是母爱。
他们对工作的无私奉献

sentences.en: The girl's selfless devotion was a source of constant happiness to him.
sentences.cn: 这个少女纯洁地、无私心地爱着他,时时刻刻都在为他祝福.

sentences.en: The judge is impartial and selfless . He is trusted by people.
sentences.cn: 这位法官公正无私, 受到人们的信任.

words.tran_cn: 自私自利；自我中心；任性
使自花授精；使近亲繁殖

trans.tran_cn: 无私的，忘我的，大公无私，公而忘私
trans.tran_en: caring about other people more than about yourself – used to show approval
